page.title: 13SPORTS AND THE GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: My dad is called MR. BROOKS. He is the trainer of our School football team. The manager is MR. FISHER. He is JULIAN'S dad. He is my friend. Usually my dad plays football, but he sometimes plays cricket, dominoes, card games, darts, snooker, billiards or golf. MR. FISHER usually plays tennis, table-tennis and badminton. CHRISTOPHER'S family often goes sailing When Christopher's dad was younger he used to play Rugby Football. He also likes badminton and tennis. RACHEL'S family sometimes play squash, tennis or swing-ball. JOHN'S mum and dad sometimes play 5 or 11 a side football. His dad does cricket, golf and cross-country running. His mum plays hockey and tennis. Written by Russell Brooks.
